params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The project on which to execute the request. The format is: projects/[PROJECT_ID_OR_NUMBER] This names the container into which the channel will be written, this does not name the newly created channel. The resulting channel's name will have a normalized version of this field as a prefix, but will add /notificationChannels/[CHANNEL_ID] to identify the channel.

params.name: data.notification_channel
params.description: Required. The definition of the NotificationChannel to create.
